name: My Boss
description: Cheng Yao, aspiring to be a lawyer, joins a top law firm and moves into an apartment near workâ€”only to discover her housemate is her new boss, Qian Heng. Initially harsh and suspicious, Qian Heng puts her through rigorous training, believing she got the job through connections. As Cheng Yao proves her talent and determination, she changes his impression, and a reluctant admiration slowly turns into romance.
